wikipedia_page.main: Chris Lilygreen (born 9 June 1965) is a Welsh football manager and former professional footballer. A striker, he joined hometown team Newport County in 1983.Lilygreen is Newport County AFC's leading all time goalscorer with 93 league and cup goals since the club was reformed in 1989.
